scripts.reinstall: cordova platform remove android && cordova plugin remove io-anyline-cordova && cordova platform add https://github.com/apache/cordova-android && cordova plugin add ../
scripts.reinstall-ios: cordova platform remove ios && cordova plugin remove io-anyline-cordova && cordova platform add ios && cordova plugin add ../
scripts.overwrite: rm -R ../src/android/io && rm -R ../src/android/res && cp -R platforms/android/src/io ../src/android/ && cp -R platforms/android/res ../src/android
scripts.overwrite-ios: rm -R ../src/ios/io && rm -R ../src/ios/res && cp -R platforms/ios/src/io ../src/android/ && cp -R platforms/ios/res ../src/ios
scripts.OandR: npm run overwrite && npm run reinstall
scripts.OandR-ios: npm run overwrite-ios && npm run reinstall-ios
